content: oh I found this guy at Hobby Lobby and I really liked how nice he looks uh and he
was only 5 bucks so I thought that was a really great deal for this guy
but I wanted to modify and make them a unique monster so I'm going to use my
hard modeling paste and this stuff is great you can really put it on all kinds
of stuff it's fairly expensive but I you know it'll last a long time this jar is
fairly large it lasts a long time I've I've had him last for years so it's
a good investment so here's the guy and you can see I've put some modeling paste
on his head and I covered his eye up and I dragged my toothpick through it to
make it look like old scars after the Dino dried I decided I want to make it a
even a bigger wound so I took this carving tool and just I'm gonna gouge
the eye out I really want to make it look like a nasty old wound so I decided
I was going to couch it even more so I gouged out the eye the eye socket I
thought that'll be really cool it's not going to use my Weidling paste again and
feel that eye socket and I'm just going to fill it up and then pull out with a
toothpick and that will give all that nice detail I look like a healed empty
socket from an old nasty wound so there we go there's a better look at it so
yeah I'm really liking that so let that dry up now that it's dry I'm going to
use my black paint and just I'm watering it down quite a bit and I'm just almost
like a wash over the wound and I think that really looks great it really brings
that detail out so he's ready for the table
Roderick lost in this jungle oh what's that oh geez I better get out
of here other some ruins I better run for
oh I could hide in here they can't get me uh oh geez ah uh uh that's a big
monster oh geez Drex that back oh please walls hold hold walls I was getting
bored okay he's going boy uh uh Radek doesn't like it here
Porter Roger we've harassed you enough today heavily buddy okay so here's the
Dino I think it looks great I really like that detail with the modeling paste
it looks like his eye was gaged out it really makes this a memorable monster
from just standard plastic monsters so that's a great way that you can modify
your monsters to make them memorable and give them special names like scar or old
one eye or something like that so there we go hey you yeah you back here huh I
know it was short what would he expect you're the short
tip watching other episodes if you want Jesus quit bugging me
hey and make sure you join the forum - how much for that oh yeah and have a
